content:
It's a bit humorous.
If you make money, they will say that you do this for money.
But if you don't make money, they will laugh at you for not even making money.
It's just that although I didn't make money, the money that the country "invested" in me may have several more zeros at the endğŸ˜†

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Chen Kaige's new film "Volunteers" sparked protests from netizens for using a "clown" as the poster. Some netizens believe that the "white clothes with red dots" worn by the little girl in the poster symbolize the Japanese flag.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: The film company explained that the poster was intended to reflect the protagonist's humiliating childhood.
